Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: 'A breeze blows by, taking the heat away while leaving behind the fragrance of the wildflowers.'}
{3: 'You fan yourself with your terminal, but you cannot save yourself from the heat of the enormous object behind you.'}
{3: 'It is a platform lift that goes from inside the building to the roof. Up there sits the detection device Babylonia installed.'}
{3: 'They are normally hidden inside the building until they are awakened by threats.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "There's no record of activation from the mainframe or the cooling system. What targeted our transport craft, then...?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee places the cover back onto the access panel, and the cooling system of the detection device finally runs again. The insufferable heat behind you gradually eases.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "Ah! You've knocked down my paints, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The awakened machine painting on the other side of the device raises his arms and protests.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm sorry, I didn't notice it... Can I do something to fix it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "Hmm... That's not necessary for now. Mark the Great is capable of dealing with this.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The awakened machine adjusts his nozzle and once again initiates his assault on the device with his paints.'}
{3: 'Half an hour ago, Lee and you were on a transport craft to Constellia to stop an unexpected riot.'}
{3: 'However, you were targeted by the detection devices of the city when you were halfway there.'}
{3: 'You ran into an awakened machine named "Mark the Great" nearby, but he said he had not seen anyone touching the detection device.'}
{2: 'Are you sure this is the one?', 3: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm sure. Given what transpired then and where our craft was when it happened, this is the only detection device that could have been activated.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But there's no sign of activation.", 3: '26'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Perhaps... the system was hacked, and they did a great job covering their trails.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you know where we should start looking?', 3: '28'}
{3: 'Regardless of how they hack into the device, there has to be an entry point.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The device is connected to the network of Constellia. They would have entered there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Our primary suspects are all Babylonia-deployed members in Constellia and... the mechanoids who have been living here.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Awakened machines. Don't forget.", 3: '32'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Right. Awakened machines...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee pauses, seemingly not used to calling them this way.'}
{3: 'Right then, you hear your colleagues calling from your comms.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Captain', 3: "This is the Engineering Force. The air defense system doesn't seem to have been activated or accessed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Understood. Thanks for the hard work.', 3: '41'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Crew', 3: "We shouldn't connect the detection devices to the mechanoids' network, I reckon. The Diplomatic Court was too charitable when they did it as a gesture of goodwill. What a joke! Now, it's coming back to bite us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Captain', 3: "It's a minor incident. Just follow the order from the headquarters.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Engineering Force Captain', 3: 'Not to mention that the launcher of the air defense system is still in our hands...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Done.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An excited voice interrupts your trails of thoughts. You turn around to see Mark, the awakened machine, gesturing for you to go over.'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'Mark the Great has decided to name this piece "Gazing into the Distance".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You and Lee walk to the side of the detection device to find the flat armor plate transformed into a canvas for graffiti.'}
{3: 'A small mechanoid stands on a short wall, flanked by a human and a Construct standing by his side.'}
{3: 'The human and Construct lean close to each other, each showing half of their faces while gazing into the distance through the head of the mechanoid as if using a telescope.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I agree. But the three... characters in your painting seem familiar.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Remembering when you first met...)'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'The mechanoid with short hair and highlights, wearing black and white with a little red and blue, whose figure looks like a half-polished marble statue.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...What can I do for you, the bipedal mechanoid in gray who looks like a foldable storage rack equipped with spray paint?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'Do you know if any workshop is still running around here? I want to perform a major check-up on my movement module.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "A workshop that is still running... I can't believe how neglected the facilities in this city are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The bipedal mechanoid in gray equipped with spray paint...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: "It's Mark. Mark the Great. Don't say my alias so seriously as if casting a spell or something...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'My apologies. I thought this is how you call each other here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: "How come a mechanoid like you don't pay attention to machine etiquette? You only use each other's alias once... Hold on.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: "What's wrong with this human? Why is your companion circling Mark like that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'Did I trigger some predatory instincts? Mark is inedible, unfortunately.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So this is the form you wish to take, Mark?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Isn't that a little too small?", 3: '84'}
{2: 'And why is your movement module a caterpillar tread now...?', 3: '85'}
{2: 'How would you climb short walls now?', 3: '86'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "It's my artistic expression! Artistic expression! You have to interpret it! Interpret it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'How can a human like you be so artistically inadequate?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But this device does not really match with art, Mark...'}
{3: 'After the detection device is connected to the Constellia network, it can be used to target anything inside the city.'}
{3: 'The air defense system it is connected to is simply better at defending the sky, but it does not need to be.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "There's nothing else to find here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee dusts off his hands and gives you back your personal terminal.'}
{2: "Let's move on to our next mission, then.", 3: '97'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Speaking of which... How\'s the "war" going?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: 'The war? We Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists are winning, obviously.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Is that so? Let's focus on the Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists, then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee looks to you for confirmation before turning around and heading for the control panel of the platform lift.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark the Great', 3: "You said you'd be fair! Don't you just target us Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists!", 4: '1'}
